dmca.title: DMCA Complaint: getbestinfo.com
dmca.body:
_____  

From: Dustin Rowles [mailto:dustin@pajiba.com] 
Sent: Tuesday, May 24, 2005 10:06 AM
To: copyright@theplanet.com
Subject: DMCA Complaint: getbestinfo.com 


May 24, 2005
 
ThePlanet.com Internet Services, Inc.
ATTN: George Poletes 
Legal Counsel
1333 Stemmons Freeway, Suite 110
Dallas, TX 75207
 
VIA FACSIMILE & EMAIL: 
FAX: 214.782.7756
Email: copyright@theplanet.com
Dear Mr. Poletes: 
My name is Dustin Rowles, Esq, Legal Counselor and Publisher of Legal Sense
Publishing, an online publishing company. I am writing to assert a DMCA
complaint against the owner of getbestinfo.com, a website that is hosted the
ThePlanet.com Internet Services. The site in question has stolen the source
code of two of our web properties, legalranks.com and investionary.com and
republished the sites, wholesale, changing only the banners at the following
urls: getbestinfo.com/legal/ & getbestinfo.com/investing. 
Legalranks.com has been in existence since January 2004, and
Investionary.com has been in existence since July 2004. The owner of
getbestinfo.com has plagiarized/scraped/ stolen the content from
legalranks.com and investionary.com verbatim, evidenced by simply comparing
the above two urls to the plagiarized sites. 
My contact information is: 
 
Dustin C. Rowles, Esq.
385 Highland Avenue #2
Somerville, MA 02144
FAX: 617-812-0734
Email: dustin@pajiba.com
The alleged infringer, and owner, of getbestinfo.com is: 
Jesse Hertzberg
1 Main Street
New York, NY, 10001 
Phone: 917-555-1212,
email: helpdesk@bigsoccer.com 
I have a good faith belief that use of the copyrighted materials described
above on the allegedly infringing web pages is not authorized by the
copyright owner, its agent, or the law. Additionally, I swear, under penalty
of perjury, that the information in the notification is accurate and that I
am the copyright owner or am authorized to act on behalf of the owner of an
exclusive right that is allegedly infringed.
Thanks for your attention to this matter,
 
 
 
Dustin C. Rowles, Esq.
Owner/Legal Counsel/Publisher
Legal Sense Publishing
